trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token that asserts that an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 클레임을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> 보안 토큰을 지정된 된 리소스에 대 한 주체의 액세스와 관련 된 권한 부여 결정을 만들었다고 가정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify whether a subject is authorized to access a specific resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>보안 토큰 제목을 특정 리소스에 액세스할 수 있는 권한이 있는지 여부를 지정할 수 있는 SAML 어설션을 사용 하 여 클레임을 지정 합니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: SAML 어설션의 클레임은 SAML 설명으로 표현 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.
trans-unit.target: SAML 사양에서는 일련의 SAML 설명 형식 정의 하 고 SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement 그 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: An SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.
trans-unit.target: SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement에는 지정된 된 리소스에 대 한 주체의 액세스와 관련 된 권한 부여 결정 이루어졌을 어설션 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the properties that are associated with the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 권한 부여 결정과 연결 된 속성을 요약 합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>|The authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to the resource represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A>|A set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the decision.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>|A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A>|The set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> property.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 설명 | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>| <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>속성에 의해 표시 되는 리소스와 관련 하 여 SAML 기관이 내린 권한 부여. | | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A>| SAML 기관이 결정을 내리는 데 사용한 SAML 어설션의 집합입니다. | | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>| Access 검색 된 리소스를 식별 하는 URI 참조입니다. | | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A>| 제목은 동작 집합을 나타내는 리소스에서 수행할 수 있는 권한이 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>속성입니다. |</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>속성을 `false` 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>속성을 `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: using the specified subject, resource, authorization decision, and the actions sought by the subject on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 주체, 리소스, 권한 부여 결정 및 리소스에서 주체가 수행 하려는 작업을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`, and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>속성을 `false`, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>속성을 `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`, 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A>속성을 `null`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"></xref> that represents the subject of the claim.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"> </xref> 클레임의 주체를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject*>

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.
trans-unit.target: Access 검색 된 리소스를 식별 하는 URI 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision"></xref> that specifies the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision"> </xref> 하 여 지정된 된 리소스에 대 한 주체의 액세스와 관련 SAML 기관이 내린 권한 부여를 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> that specifies the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 형식의 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"> </xref> 동작의 집합을 지정 하는 주체는 리소스에서 수행 하도록 허용 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions*>

trans-unit.source: using the specified subject, resource, authorization decision, and the actions sought by the subject on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 주체, 리소스, 권한 부여 결정 및 리소스에서 주체가 수행 하려는 작업을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>속성을 `false`, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>속성을 `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"></xref> that represents the subject of the claim.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"> </xref> 클레임의 주체를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject*>

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.
trans-unit.target: Access 검색 된 리소스를 식별 하는 URI 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision"></xref> that specifies the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision"> </xref> 하 여 지정된 된 리소스에 대 한 주체의 액세스와 관련 SAML 기관이 내린 권한 부여를 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> that specifies the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 형식의 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"> </xref> 동작의 집합을 지정 하는 주체는 리소스에서 수행 하도록 허용 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> that contains a set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"> </xref> 하는 SAML 기관이 권한 부여 결정을 내리는 데 사용한 SAML 어설션의 집합을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence*>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 에 의해 지정된 된 리소스에 대 한 주체의 액세스와 관련 SAML 기관이 내린 권한 부여를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The AccessDecision property corresponds to the `Decision` attribute of the `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: AccessDecision 속성에 해당 하는 `Decision` 특성에는 `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` OASIS SAML Security Assertion Markup Language () 사양에 대 한 어설션 및 프로토콜에 정의 된 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision"></xref> values that specify the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision"> </xref> 주체가 지정된 된 리소스에 액세스할 수와 관련은 SAML 기관이 내린 권한 부여를 지정 하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Exception type
trans-unit.target: 예외 형식

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 조건

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException></xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The AccessDecision property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: AccessDecision 속성을 설정 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Adds claims based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 클레임 컬렉션을이 인스턴스의 속성을 기반으로 하는 클레임을 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The AddClaimsToList method adds a claim to the `claims` parameter for each action specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 클레임을 추가 하는 AddClaimsToList 메서드는 `claims` 에 지정 된 각 작업에 대 한 매개 변수는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each claim that is added to the collection is based on the action, and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 작업을 기준으로 컬렉션에 추가 된 각 클레임은 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>, 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The claim resource type is <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource>.
trans-unit.target: 클레임 리소스 형식이 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource>입니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that contains the set of claims to add to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> 형식의 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"> </xref> 추가할 클레임 집합이 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: claims is .
trans-unit.target: claimsis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of security claim.
trans-unit.target: 보안 클레임의 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The type of security claim.
trans-unit.target: 보안 클레임의 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Always `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.
trans-unit.target: 항상 `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: SAML 기관이 권한 부여 결정을 내리는 데 사용한 증거를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `<Evidence>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>속성에 해당 하는 `<Evidence>` OASIS SAML Security Assertion Markup Language () 사양에 대 한 어설션 및 프로토콜에 정의 된 요소입니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> that contains a set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"> </xref> 하는 SAML 기관이 권한 부여 결정을 내리는 데 사용한 SAML 어설션의 집합을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 속성이 읽기 전용인 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스를는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>클래스 읽기 전용 호출은 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A>메서드.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이 인스턴스의 속성이 읽기 전용 이면 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스를 읽기 전용으로 설정 하면 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: MakeReadOnly 메서드를 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>속성이 `true` 이 인스턴스의 속성을 더 이상 설정할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reads the SAML authorization statement from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 XML 판독기에서 SAML 권한 부여 설명을 읽습니다.

trans-unit.source: The ReadXml method sets the following properties: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A>
trans-unit.target: 다음 속성을 설정 하는 ReadXml 메서드에:- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the SAML authorization statement.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>SAML 권한 부여 설명을 읽을 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authorization statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> SAML 사양에 정의 된 SAML 권한 부여 설명에서 XML 요소를 읽을 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> 읽는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> 디지털 서명의 절.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> 결정 하는 디지털 서명을 만든 보안 토큰입니다.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: -or- samlSerializer is .

trans-unit.source: reader refers to an XML element that does not contain the and attributes.
trans-unit.target: reader포함 하지 않는 XML 요소를 참조 하는 및 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- reader refers to an XML element that does not have , , and child elements.
trans-unit.target: -또는- reader 하지 않은 XML 요소를 참조 , , 및 자식 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The resource to which access is sought by the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: 리소스에 대 한 액세스의 주체가 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> 보안 토큰입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `Decision` attribute of the `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>속성에 해당 하는 `Decision` 특성에는 `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` OASIS SAML Security Assertion Markup Language () 사양에 대 한 어설션 및 프로토콜에 정의 된 요소를.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.
trans-unit.target: Access 검색 된 리소스를 식별 하는 URI 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 주체는 리소스에서 수행 하도록 허용 동작의 집합을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The SamlActions property corresponds to the `<Action>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: SamlActions 속성에 해당 하는 `<Action>` OASIS SAML Security Assertion Markup Language () 사양에 대 한 어설션 및 프로토콜에 정의 된 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> that specifies the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> 형식의 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"> </xref> 동작의 집합을 지정 하는 주체는 리소스에서 수행 하도록 허용 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes the SAML authorization statement into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 XML serializer에 SAML 권한 부여 설명을 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the WriteXml method to write the current <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> instance into a `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element.
trans-unit.target: WriteXml 메서드를 사용 하 여 현재 쓰기 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>인스턴스는 `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` 요소.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the SAML authorization statement.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>SAML 권한 부여 설명을 쓸.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> 하는 SAML 어설션에 XML 요소를에서 쓸 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> 을 쓸 수 있는 즉 <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> 절.

trans-unit.source: writer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: -or- samlSerializer is .
